Class AccelerometerSensor

java.lang.Object

      MechSim.Sensors.AnalogSensor
          MechSim.Sensors.AccelerometerSensor

public class AccelerometerSensor
extends AnalogSensor

Measures the force currently applied to the Robot to make it move (e.g., Robot's velocity)

Author:
Gurwinder Gulati

Constructor Detail

AccelerometerSensor

public AccelerometerSensor(Robot robot,
                           double pollingInterval,
                           AccelerometerSensor.Direction dir)
Creates a Sensor to measure the force currently applied to the Robot to make it move (e.g., Robot's velocity) in one direction

Parameters:
robot - Robot the Sensor is attached to
pollingInterval - Time between Sensor updates
dir - Direction the AccelerometerSensor measures in
